short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks movie spoilers on Reddit and Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "No Spoiler Zone" is a Chrome extension powered by the Gemini API, dedicated to keeping your Twitter and Reddit feeds spoiler-free. Enjoy browsing without the worry of encountering plot twists or spoilers, thanks to its intelligent spoiler detection technology. Stay immersed in your social media experience with "No Spoiler Zone."
